abstract: Exclusive interview by Egyptian state television with newly freed Israeli soldier Sgt First Class Gilad Shalit provokes strong but polar opposite reactions on each side of Israeli-Egyptian border; Israelis blast Egypt for interviewing exhausted captive before he had even seen his family, and Egyptians criticize station for not focusing on Palestinians being released in deal between Israel and Hamas.
snippet: An interview by Egyptian state television with Sgt. First Class Gilad Shalit provoked polar opposite reactions on both sides of the Israel-Egypt border.
lead_paragraph: An interview by Egyptian state television with Sgt. First Class Gilad Shalit provoked polar opposite reactions on both sides of the Israel-Egypt border.

headline.main: Sharp Criticism for Egyptian Interview With Soldier
headline.print_headline: Sharp Criticism for Egyptian Interview With Soldier
headline.seo: Egyptian TV Interview With Shalit Is Sharply Criticized
